stories.text:
Hey,

I'm doing a research about how worldwide remote teams keep a good level of communication when they're hiring worldwide.

This way, I'd like to know what's your favorite methods to communicate as remote team and ensure the team keeps focused and happy.

Here is a quick template of questions about answers I'm looking for :)

1. What are the difficulties you face with remote communication with worldwide remote team ? 2. How do you try to solve it ? 3. What's your job ?

Many thanks <3

stories.text:
I'm building https://findmymastodon.com!

If you haven't heard of Mastodon yet, then recent developments in Facebookland should motivate you to move to more privacy-friendly social networks. Mastodon is a decentralised social network, sort of like many little Facebooks linking to form the global network. Each instance is moderated by a human person and most are dedicated to a single theme, like art or music or technology. No more obscure or monopolistic rules governing your online life.

I'm building findmymastodon.com to help you find an instance to suit your tastes, and to try to make a tiny dent in the huge privacy / surveillance problem.

https://findmymastodon.com is far from finished, but I'm trying to drum up support for the project. Feedback, suggestions, and ideas are welcome :)

#tech #surveillance #mastodon #privacy #capitalism #webdev
stories.title: I'm Building HTTPS://Findmymastodon.com
